page.title: 15CHESWICK GREEN SCHOOL
page.content: Cheswick Green School was opened on the 20th May 1974 with a class of 30 reception children.At this present time the school has 411 children.We have 6 indoor classrooms,6 outdoor classrooms,a resource room,a library, in which there is a television,and an assembly hall.Behind the hall,which is also used as a dining room,is the kitchen.There is a Nursery Unit attached to the school.Recently,an adventure playground has been built. We have a large playing field on which we take part in many different activities.These activities include Athletics,Football,Cricket and Hockey. We also have several school clubs,such as Chess Club,Nature Club and Gymnastics Club.We have music teachers for brass and woodwind instruments who come into school once a week to take the lessons.
